The more upscale of Raval's vegetarian options, Teresa Carles is delicious.  The food is tasty, and features quality vegetables: pretty great!  The ambience is cool, comfortable, and relaxing.  The slightly higher prices attract a crowd that is a bit older than what you might expect to run into in any other vegetarian restaurant in Raval.  This is a great place to go for a lunch with colleagues.I recommend taking advantage of the lunchtime menú del día offer.  Their lunchtime dishes have never disappointed me!
